first.title: Peer-to-Peer
first.paragraph: A global community of users serving as jurors.

section-use-case.h2: As the economy becomes global and digital, disputes arise in many areas that cannot be sovled by courts or traditional arbitration systems. Kleros can solve them in a fast, affordable and secure way.

section-hero.h2: Information organized by your community for your community.
section-hero.button-primary: Create Your Own List With Kleros Curate

first.title: A World of Lists
first.paragraph: What tokens to list in an exchange? What items to accept in a marketplace? Which content to remove in a social media platform? All these are problems of list curation.

second.title: Empower Your Community
second.paragraph: Integrate with Kleros, define guidelines and let your community take care of the curation.

third.title: Fairness and Transparency
third.paragraph: Kleros will make sure that the curation decisions are done in a fair and transparent way.

section-3.h2: Create your own token curated registry and put the information power in the hands of your community.

section-hero.h2: Trade, hire and pay secured by trustless dispute resolution.

first.title: The Risk of Online Commerce
first.paragraph: When contracting someone online there is always the risk of the other party not fulfilling the agreement, or acting maliciously.

second.title: Use Kleros Escrow
second.paragraph: In case something goes wrong, the dispute will be resolved by Kleros.

third.title: Transact Securely
third.paragraph: With Kleros Escrow, the buyer and seller can be confident that the other party will fulfill their obligation.

section-3.h2: Start using Kleros Escrow to reduce counterparty risk in your online transactions.

section-4.h2: If you're building an e-commerce platfrom, delegate dispute resolution to Kleros. Focus on your product. Kleros will take care of the disputes.

section-hero.h2: Kleros is an open source online dispute resolution protocol which uses blockchain and crowdsourcing to fairly adjudicate disputes. Development efforts are coordinated by <anchor>Coopérative Kleros</anchor>, a Société Coopérative d’Intérêt Collectif (SCIC) incorporated in France. All our research and code development are open source and free for anyone to use.

section-3.h2: Our mission is to develop software empowering justice inclusing and individual freedom.

section-4.h2: We are a cross-discipline and international team passionate about blockchain and its potential to transform law and governance.
